title: @fast_roi
description: Creates Atlas-based ROI masked in ANAT's original space. The script executes rapidly for realtime fMRI applications.

region.title: Region
region.description: Symbolic atlas-based region name. Use repeated instances to specify a mask of numerous regions. Each region is assigned a power of 2 integer in the output mask.

drawn_roi.title: Drawn ROI
drawn_roi.description: A user drawn ROI in standard (tlrc) space. This ROI gets added with the REGION ROI.

anat.title: Anatomical Volume
anat.description: ANAT is the volume to be put in standard space. If ANAT is already in TLRC space, there is no need for -base option.

anat_ns.title: Anatomical Volume No Skull
anat_ns.description: Same as -anat, but indicates that the skull has been removed already.

base.title: TLRC Base
base.description: Name of the reference TLRC volume.

roi_grid.title: ROI Grid
roi_grid.description: The volume that defines the final ROI's grid.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix used to tag the names the ROIs output.

twopass.title: Two-pass Flag
twopass.description: Make TLRC transformation more robust. Use it if TLRC transform step fails.
